japanese: なんだ、!0か。/まぁな、夏達と違って野球部は/特に出し物しねぇしな。
english: What, !0. /Unlike Natsu and others, /baseball club has no event.

japanese: なら、猛練習ですね！/それでもダメなら特訓しかないです！！
english: Then intense practice! /If not, special training!!

japanese: なりたいって気持ちを、/忘れなければ大丈夫さ。
english: As long as you don't forget /that desire, it's fine.

japanese: なりたいって気持ちを、/忘れなければ大丈夫よ。
english: As long as you don't forget /that desire, it's fine.

japanese: なに……、/ゲド高流に話をつけるだけだ。/心配するな。
english: What... /Just settling things Gedokou style. /Don't worry.

japanese: なんだか、一日中騒いでたから/同じ学校の友達のような気がしてたけど。/……そうなんだよな。
english: Somehow, since we were noisy all day, /I felt like school friends. /...That's how it is.

japanese: なんだか、一日中騒いでたから/同じ学校の友達のような気がしてたけど。/……そうなんだよね。
english: Somehow, since we were noisy all day, /I felt like school friends. /...That's how it is.

japanese: なに、これ？/この写真を見てたの？
english: What's this? /Were you looking at this photo?

japanese: なら、オレに呼吸を合わせろ！/相棒の鼓動を感じ取れば、/後は気合をぶつけるだけだ！！
english: Match my rhythm! /Feel your partner's heartbeat, /then put in your spirit!!

japanese: なに？/この蚊の鳴くような声の客引きは……？
english: What? /This weak-voiced customer caller...?

japanese: なるほど。/元日本代表選手ともなれば、/知名度はありますからね！
english: I see. /Being a former Japan national player, /you have recognition!

japanese: なによ、いきなり！？/これって、新聞部の人がよく持ってる/カメラを入れるケースでしょ？
english: What, suddenly!? /This is the case /newspaper club uses for cameras, right?

japanese: なら、一緒に動かないか。/一人よりもその方が楽しいだろ？
english: Then want to move together? /More fun than alone, right?

japanese: なら、一緒に動かない？/一人よりもその方が楽しいでしょ？
english: Then want to move together? /More fun than alone, right?

japanese: なんだ、これ？/この写真を見てたのか？
english: What's this? /Were you looking at this photo?

japanese: なんだ……もっと積極的になれば、/英雄先生だって喜ぶのに……。
english: What... if more proactive, /Shimazu-sensei would be happy...

japanese: なんだ、ラン。/屋上からも撮ってるのか？
english: What, Ran. /Filming from the roof too?

japanese: なんか楽しそうね、ロイ。
english: Roy looks like he's having fun.

japanese: なんたって、年に一度の学園祭だからな！/燃えない方がどうかしてるぜ！
english: It's the once-a-year festival! /Something's wrong if not fired up!

japanese: なんだ、夏？/屋上でサボリか？
english: What, Natsu? /Slacking on the roof?

japanese: なにせ、太陽学園には、/問題児がゴロゴロいるからな……。
english: After all, Taiyo Academy /has problem kids everywhere...

japanese: なになに？/何やったの？
english: What what? /What did you do?

japanese: なまけてる暇なんかないわ！
english: No time to slack off!

japanese: なんか楽しそうだな、ロイ。
english: Roy looks like he's having fun.

japanese: なに、エンリョしてるのよ！/サッカー部のみんなと相談して/やったげる！
english: Don't hold back! /I'll discuss with soccer club /and do it!

japanese: なんだか引っかかる言い方だけど……。/ま、いいや。/憶えてたらね！！
english: That phrasing bothers me... /Well, whatever. /Remember it!!

japanese: なによ、不幸の写真って……？
english: What, a photo of misfortune...?

japanese: なのに、無理に恋人を作ったって、/その人のために……なんて/思わないじゃないですか。
english: But if you force a relationship, /you won't think... /for that person...

japanese: なんじゃ？/おぬしも、力仕事を頼みに来たのかのう？
english: What? /Have you come to ask for labor too?

japanese: なんじゃ？/プールに金魚が泳いどる……。/金魚すくいかのう？
english: What? /Goldfish in the pool... /Goldfish scooping?

japanese: なんだか早いよな。/ついこないだ、太陽学園に/転校してきたと思ってたのによ。
english: Time flies. /I thought you just transferred /to Taiyo Academy.

japanese: なら、/本番で練習してきたものを出し切れば、/それでいいじゃないか。
english: Then just give your all /with what you practiced, /that's fine.

japanese: なんたって学園祭だからな。/これぐらいバカ騒ぎしなきゃ、/楽しんだ事にならねぇよ。
english: It's the festival. /If you don't go this crazy, /it's not really fun.
